summary: Impy the friendly little dinosaur and his friends join together in order to rescue their new baby panda. which was kidnapped by a man who wants to put the panda in his private collection.
cast: Hannes Maurer|Julia Ziffer|Oliver Kalkofe|Frank Schaff|Stefan Krause|Oliver Pocher|Anke Engelke|Christoph Maria Herbst|Wolfgang Völz|Wigald Boning|Roland Hemmo|Madeleine Blaustein|J. David Brimmer|James Carter Cathcart|Tricia Diaz|Mehmet Ali Erbil|Wayne Grayson|Emlyn Elisabeth Morinelli|Lisa Ortiz|Peter Reinhardt|Kayzie Rogers|Veronica Taylor|Marc Thompson|Oliver Wyman
title: Urmel voll in Fahrt
